step.description: Fry the onions and whole spices in the butter for 10 mins. Add the curry paste and cook until aromatic.
step.description_fr: Faire revenir l'oignon et les épices dans le beurre pendant 10 minutes. Ajouter la pâte de curry et mélanger un moment.

step.description: Add the rice and the raisins, stir and cook for a good few mins, then add the stock and bring to the boil.
step.description_fr: Ajouter le riz et les raisins secs, mélanger et cuire pendant quelques minutes. Ajouter le bouillon et porter à ébullition.

step.description: Cover with a tight-fitting lid and when really boiling lower the heat and cook for 10 mins.
step.description_fr: Couvrir la casserolle et diminuer la température. Cuire pendant 10 minutes.

step.description: Turn the heat off but don’t lift the lid and leave to sit for 20 mins.
step.description_fr: Eteindre la plaque et laisser couvert pendant 20 minutes.

step.description: Stir in half the toasted almonds and chopped coriander, with the rest of the coriander and the almonds thrown over the top.
step.description_fr: Saupoudrer d'amandes effilées toréfiées et de coriandre.
